attributes.action: build a local gym for Matthew Rhodes, Mikko Ball and Sam Bourne to own and run.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to run and own a local gym paid for by the government.  Many gyms are just too expensive to pay for and the number of obese children is on the rise.  We want to stop this by running our own gym for all ages at an affordable price in our local area of Carshalton.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
